definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: "Your lecture is called 'From Satori to Silicon Valley, ' " he explained.
sentences.chinese: “你的講座叫做‘從禪悟到硅谷’，”他解釋道。

sentences.english: One of the health talk was hosted by CASSA.
sentences.chinese: 華美老年協會舉辦的健康講座之一。

sentences.english: In this speech, Dean Ching-yun Chuang promotes the importance of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 本講座我們邀請莊景雲主任來推廣快樂的重要性。

sentences.english: Let's compare notes about the lecture we've just attended.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來討論一下剛聽過的那個講座吧。

sentences.english: The society decided on(upon)a lecture series and appointed a committeeman to determine the dates, etc.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的聯誼活動，座談會，漢語課程和專題講座。

sentences.english: You want me to write an introduction to your lectures?
sentences.chinese: 你要我寫一篇文章介紹你的講座文集？

sentences.english: You won't get everything you need simply by coming to the lectures.
sentences.chinese: 只聽講座無法讓你得到所需的全部知識。

sentences.english: A series of extractive lectures have been held by the institute for 10 times.
sentences.chinese: 該學院推出的精品系列講座已舉辦10場。

sentences.english: In this lecture, I want to emphasize two things.
sentences.chinese: 在這次的講座裏，我想強調兩件事。

sentences.english: She toured the country, giving lecture after lecture.
sentences.chinese: 她周遊全國，不斷地舉行講座。

sentences.english: So I hope to combine forethought on that lecture with a start on the book.
sentences.chinese: 因此我希望藉着開始寫這本書也構思一下講座的內容。

sentences.english: Joe went enthusiastically to every lecture like a fresher.
sentences.chinese: 喬像一個大學新生一樣，熱衷於每一次講座。

sentences.english: Professor Li will give a series of lectures on the Middle East issue.
sentences.chinese: 李教授將就中東問題作一系列的講座。

sentences.english: Before Wang's lecture, to sang songs for a whole night with my undergraduate students.
sentences.chinese: 聽王老師講座前一天，跟本科生去唱了一晚的歌兒。

sentences.english: Identity doesn't relly matter when you're in a chat room discussing politics or hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 當你在聊天室講座政治或嗜好時，身份並不那麼重要。

sentences.english: All Rights Reserved by Gymboree Early Childhood Education Center.
sentences.chinese: 本次講座最終解釋權歸東莞金寶貝早教中心所有。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
